item.title: Sensible World of Soccer (XBLA)
item.description: When I finally got around to picking up a 360 a couple of years ago, the first thing I did when I set it up was download Sensible World Of Soccer (SWOS). Forget Halo, or Gears of War, or Mass Effect; SWOS was what I cared about. The Amiga version is the game I routinely tell people is “the best game ever made” and I played it everyday for years during the 90s. While people may scoff at rating a football game so highly, I’m certainly not the only one#Awards).
